column4: any ideas on how to set up a secondary gateway for internet traffic (i have two isps and two routers). i'm afraid it is easy in windows because they have a default gateway and you can just add others in a list. I suspect it can be done with the route command, but have not figured out the right parameters to not confuse network traffic
you have multiple interfaces on your computer?
can't help you then. I have no idea about virtual interfaces.
